name: Harvard University
description: Harvard University is a private Ivy League research university, one of the most prestigious institutions in the world.

name: Stanford University
description: Stanford University is a leading research university known for its entrepreneurial spirit and Silicon Valley connections.

name: MIT
description: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology is a private research university specializing in science and technology.

name: Tsinghua University
description: Tsinghua University is a prestigious public research university in Beijing, often called the 'MIT of China'.

name: Peking University
description: Peking University is one of the most prestigious universities in China, located in Beijing.

name: University of Tokyo
description: The University of Tokyo is Japan's premier national university and a leading research institution.

name: Seoul National University
description: SNU is the oldest and most prestigious national university in South Korea.

name: National University of Singapore
description: NUS is Singapore's oldest and largest university, consistently ranked among the top universities in Asia.

name: University of Cambridge
description: The University of Cambridge is one of the world's oldest and most prestigious universities.

name: Oxford University
description: The University of Oxford is a collegiate research university, the oldest university in the English-speaking world.

name: ETH Zurich
description: ETH Zurich is one of the world's leading science and technology universities.

name: LMU Munich
description: Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich is one of Germany's most prestigious universities.

name: École Polytechnique
description: École Polytechnique is a leading French scientific research institution.

name: University of Melbourne
description: The University of Melbourne is Australia's second-oldest university and a leading research institution.

name: Lincoln Middle School
description: Lincoln Middle School is a public school serving students in grades 6-8.

name: Springfield Elementary
description: Springfield Elementary School provides quality education for K-5 students.

name: Sunshine Kindergarten
description: Sunshine Kindergarten provides early childhood education for children ages 3-6.

name: Beijing Normal University
description: Beijing Normal University is a prestigious university specializing in teacher education.

name: Kyoto University
description: Kyoto University is one of Japan's most prestigious national universities, known for Nobel laureates.

name: Fudan University
description: Fudan University is a major research university in Shanghai, consistently ranked among China's top universities.
